body:
That's true. I don't think `mark_shared_storage` is a good solution though. I think we should be working towards an API that matches the underlying semantics instead of this sort of inversion of control.

In this case, that would mean exposing a `Variable` constructor that takes a `base`/`view` or fixing `set_`.
